name: promise-connection
description: Promise/A+ utilities for abstracting remote window requests on message ports.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s promise-connection -o dist/promise-connection.js && uglifyjs < dist/promise-connection.js > dist/promise-connection.js.min && stat -f '%z %N' dist/*

author: Corey Frang <gnarf37@gmail.com>
